Public NotInheritable Class ActivityAction(Of T1, T2, T3, T4, T5, T6, T7) Inherits ActivityDelegate
generic <typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4, typename T5, typename T6, typename T7> public ref class ActivityAction sealed : System::Activities::ActivityDelegate

typeparam.span: 活動委派的第一個 in 引數的型別。

span.span: The type of the first in argument of the activity delegate.

typeparam.span: 活動委派的第二個 in 引數的型別。

typeparam.span: 活動委派的第七個 in 引數的型別。

span.span: The type of the seventh in argument of the activity delegate.

summary.span: 定義活動委派，其中擁有七個 in 引數而且不會傳回值。

span.span: Defines an activity delegate that has seven in arguments and does not return a value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 活動委派會允許開發人員定義由協力廠商指定之活動所需的簽章。An activity delegate allows a developer to define the required signature of an activity that will be specified by a third party. 此型別有多個泛型版本，取自已呼叫活動中第 1 至 16 個引數。There are multiple generic versions of this type that take from 1 to 16 arguments for the activity that is called. 另外還有**ActivityFunc**傳回值的活動委派的類型。There are also **ActivityFunc** types for activity delegates that return values.
